		Question: who is martin luther king jr facts

answer:
Sure, here is the answer:

Martin Luther King Jr. was born on January 15, 1929, in Atlanta, Georgia.  He was a Baptist minister and a leader of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference (SCLC) and led the Montgomery bus boycott. He led the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom in 1963. He won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1964. King was assassinated in Memphis, Tennessee, on April 4
